sections.title: Genesis 4:20 – And Adah bare Jabal: he

narration.text: And Adah bare Jabal: he was the father of such as dwell in tents, and of such as have cattle.

visual.prompt: Vivid scene for: And Adah bare Jabal: he was the father of such as dwell in tents, and of such as have cattle.

sections.title: Genesis 4:21 – And his brother’s name was

narration.text: And his brother’s name was Jubal: he was the father of all such as handle the harp and organ.

visual.prompt: Vivid scene for: And his brother’s name was Jubal: he was the father of all such as handle the harp and organ.

sections.title: Genesis 4:22 – And Zillah, she also bare

narration.text: And Zillah, she also bare Tubal–cain, an instructer of every artificer in brass and iron: and the sister of Tubal–cain was Naamah.

visual.prompt: Vivid scene for: And Zillah, she also bare Tubal–cain, an instructer of every artificer in brass and iron: and the sister of Tubal–cain was Naamah.

sections.title: Genesis 4:23 – And Lamech said unto his

narration.text: And Lamech said unto his wives, Adah and Zillah, Hear my voice; ye wives of Lamech, hearken unto my speech: for I have injured a man to my wounding, and a young man.

visual.prompt: Vivid scene for: And Lamech said unto his wives, Adah and Zillah, Hear my voice; ye wives of Lamech, hearken unto my speech: for I have slain a man to my wounding, and a young man to my hurt.

social_media.title: 📖 Today's Verses: Genesis 4:20 – Genesis 4:23
social_media.description:
📖 Today's Verses: Genesis 4:20 – Genesis 4:23

✝️ Welcome to Daily Bible Passages! We post 3 short Bible videos daily, featuring 3–5 verses each.

Genesis 4:20 And Adah bare Jabal: he was the father of such as dwell in tents, and of such as have cattle.

Genesis 4:21 And his brother’s name was Jubal: he was the father of all such as handle the harp and organ.

Genesis 4:22 And Zillah, she also bare Tubal–cain, an instructer of every artificer in brass and iron: and the sister of Tubal–cain was Naamah.

Genesis 4:23 And Lamech said unto his wives, Adah and Zillah, Hear my voice; ye wives of Lamech, hearken unto my speech: for I have slain a man to my wounding, and a young man to my hurt.

🙌 Subscribe and join our journey from Genesis to Revelation — one small passage at a time!
